dialogues.text: Welcome to the catabolic lab! whats your assignment you say?
Well you'll be needing to break down these complex molecules for ATP materials! Sounds easy, right? Well... let’s see if your reflexes are up to the challenge.
A line will zip back and forth inside it. Hit the perfect moment to break down the molecule! But be careful—with too many misses, mayhem might break loose.
Oh, and I hope you like surprises! Some molecules have a few... quirks.
Lipids: The bar moves unpredictably, so stay sharp!
Polysaccharide: This one’s fast—blink and you might miss it.
Protein: The bar AND the line both move. Double the motion, double the madness!
You’ve got limited lives, and each molecule has a time limit. Think fast, react faster, and show me you’ve got what it takes. Ready?
